summary: Fiery toned scales, and the rest of the armor is black. Available only in female, until I finish editing the male armor.
descriptionHtml:
Edited .dds files for the Dragonscale female armor, boots, gloves and helmet. 

*Note: Of course the boots, gloves and helmet are for both male and female, I have not yet edited the male armor. I will also be doing the shield.

To install, just extract to your Skyrim folder, and click yes to merge the Data files.
To uninstall, go to your skyrim directory... Data/textures/Armor/ and delete the dragonscale folder (which will delete the files within).
author: Kashkakoshka

files.name: Fiery Dragonscale Armor female Fiery Helm option
files.fileName: Fiery Dragonscale Armor female Fiery Helm option-4892-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: Added an optional fiery helmet. Just copy it from its folder and replace the helmet.dds in the dragonscale folder.
